column4: what could be the problem if after installing utidylib in synaptic python can't import tidylib ?
hello repeating myself  -- what could be the problem if after installing utidylib in synaptic python can't import tidylib ?
Possibly the Python version you have installed. or you do not have the HTML Tidy  Library installed http://tidy.sourceforge.net/
i installed tidy with synaptic also
